title: Uber to allow marketers to target riders with ads based on destination; The ride-hailing company is expanding its advertising business, offering ads across its app for the first time
text:
Companies like Alphabet Inc.'s GOOGL Google and Meta Platforms Inc.'s META Facebook have long recorded users' web behavior to target them with ads. Retailers such as Walmart Inc. WMT and Kroger Co. KR can track when, where and how you shop for the benefit of brands that advertise with them.

Uber has been building its ad business for several years, though most of its growth to date has come from ads placed on the Uber Eats food-delivery app, said Mark Grether, general manager of Uber Advertising.

The ride-hailing ad business could grow far larger, Mr. Grether said, especially when self-driving cars become more common.
